title: Dr. Dennis Ulbrich
text:
Email
  
  
    
     Linkedin
  

  
  


I am interested in different topics of pure and applied mathematics, thereby touching the broad fields of analysis, ergodic theory and dynamical systems.
Most recently, I worked as a lecturer and research assistant at HS Bremen.
Beforehand, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the Institute for Analysis and Numerics of the University of Münster supervised by Prof. Marlies Pirner.
I obtained my PhD (Dr. rer. nat.) in Mathematics at the University of Bremen under the supervison of Prof. J. Rademacher and Prof. M. Keßeböhmer.
Moreoever, I did some teaching at the Jacobs University Bremen.
Further details can be found on the subpages above.

Most recently, I worked as a lecturer and research assistant at HS Bremen.
